__e: Singing and music will show this to the world.
Song and dance. Just like in the country in the old days.
~ All for the love of you ~
There's nothing in this world I like more than the sound of the trumpet of the swan.
I love bird calls and know the names of many flowers.
Sunny day, wishing the clouds away.
Song is the life of the soul.
You don't think our singing's going to be good enough for you?
They say that singing is the best way to communicate with a child.
